plot: Erik is suffering from strange sounds in his head, ever since his girlfriend suddenly died. Even a visit to his shrink, Dr. Katz, offers no solution. Until the funeral.
title: Lachen!
plot_es: Erik is suffering from strange sounds in his head, ever since his girlfriend suddenly died. Even a visit to his shrink, Dr. Katz, offers no solution. Until the funeral.
